title: The Dread Pirate Trump Edition
description:
Gary Cohn, South African land, and Dodd-Frank in this week's Slate Money with Felix Salmon, Slate Moneybox columnist Jordan Weissmann, and political risk consultant Anna Szymanski. 
Production by Daniel Schroeder
